onboarding.title: Persistent custom views
onboarding.content:
Your view customizations (e.g. column choice, column order, sorting) is also specified in the browser URL bar.

Bookmark the page to easily save your favorite view, or send your team members the URL link so they can share the same view as yours.

onboarding.title: Creating a new experiment
onboarding.content:
Clone any task to create a draft copy using right-click or the task context menu.

Reproduce the original run by executing the copy, or modify any element of the new draft to try out a new approach.

onboarding.title: Comparing experiments
onboarding.content: Select the experiments you want to compare, then compare them using the bottom bar.

onboarding.title: View in full screen
onboarding.content:
Focus on a single experiment details by using the full screen view.

Get finer controls on viewing the experiment results thanks to the additional screen real-estate.
You can toggle between full-screen and experiment table view.
